mapper.select: SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(stock_name, name_ko, name_en, ticker, symbol, stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.link, n.content, n.source, n.country, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n ORDER BY n.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(stock_name, name_ko, name_en, ticker, symbol, stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.link, n.content, n.source, n.country, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n WHERE n.country = #{country} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(stock_name, name_ko, name_en, ticker, symbol, stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.link, n.content, n.source, n.country, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n WHERE n.stock_code = #{stockCode} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(stock_name, name_ko, name_en, ticker, symbol, stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.link, n.content, n.source, n.country, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n WHERE n.news_id = #{newsId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news ( stock_id, stock_code, title, link, content, source, country, published_at, created_at ) VALUES ( #{stockId}, #{stockCode}, #{title}, #{link}, #{content}, #{source}, #{country}, #{publishedAt}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, link = #{link}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE news_id = #{newsId}
